channel.title: Optiop Blog
channel.description: A blog to discuss the latest trends in operations and infrastructure management.

item.title: Release of Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog v2.0
item.description: Release of Tailwind Nextjs Starter Blog template v2.0, refactored with Nextjs App directory and React Server Components setup.Discover the new features and how to migrate from V1.
item.author: contact@optiop.org (Optiop Consulting Group)
